text: guys today's recipe is a delicious
almost no baked mini cheesecake with a
gingersnap crust so I'm starting by
making my gingersnap crust
these are ginger snaps you need about 30
of them and you just grind them up in a
food processor you need about one and a
half cups which is what you get from 30
and then add a quarter teaspoon of salt
three tablespoons of granulated sugar
and five tablespoons of melted unsalted
butter have your oven preheating 375
degrees to line the cups of ten standard
muffin cups what about three tablespoons
into each cup then what you want to do
is press your crumbs into the bottom and
up the sides okay pop these into the
oven and bake them until they're just
turning slightly darker about ten
minutes now it's time to make the
filling the base of which is cream
cheese you want to beat one stick of
cream cheese until it's light and fluffy
if your pinkies are soft enough it
shouldn't take too long to get it to the
texture you want it needs to be nice and
light add a half a cup of confectioner's
sugar the sugar into your cream cheese
now these are almond cheesecakes the
recipe calls for a half a teaspoon of
pure almond extract but I find the
almond extract really really strong so
I'm only going to use like 1/4 T's
all right now beat some cream this is a
cup of heavy cream
likely splattering if you hold it
straight up and down and I just learned
that it's very second you watched it
happen now fold about a third of your
cream into the cream cheese mixture just
to lighten it up a little bit
stir I guess stir it in and then fold in
the remaining cream you do this to
lighten it a little bit so that the
cream doesn't break down too much when
you're folding it in so it has as much
loft and volume as possible
I can spoon the mixture into the baked
pie shells or crusts I guess you know it
would really be good for this actually a
piping bag it would be the easiest way
to get it in either that or a resealable
bag that you snip off the corner and
then just pipe the filling in with
scissors that work preferably and then
pipe oh yeah so much better so much
better you guys and then pop these into
the refrigerator until they're set at
least an hour and up to overnight take
them out nice and set a little bit of
toasted sliced almonds on the top and
you have such a cute elegant practically
no baked dessert completely adorable
right
mm oh my god you have to try these they
are so delicious hmm
you
